CMS_Widget.WidgetDescription: Displays current information about the CMS. The data is refreshed regularly according to a specified interval. The widget may also be used to restart the application or clear its cache.

This widget provides an accordion layout divided into multiple panes that can be expanded or collapsed. Each pane defines a separate widget zone, so any content may be added into the layout. Users can click on the pane headers to select which one should be displayed.

CMS_Widget.WidgetDocumentation: The zones generated by the layout will automatically match the type of the parent zone into which the widget is placed.

CMS_Widget.WidgetDescription: Displays a panel that can be collapsed or expanded. The panel contains an additional widget zone, so any type of content may be added.
CMS_Widget.WidgetProperties: <form><field column="AllowDesignMode" visible="false" /></form>
CMS_Widget.WidgetDocumentation: The zone generated inside the panel will automatically match the type of the parent zone into which the widget is placed.
